turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please order me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the location closest to your office?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. On Hwy 31in Birmingham

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order me a Venti Cafe Latte with milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you see if they have almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. Do you want a flavor?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What flavor would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What do you get?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I like hazelnut

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. Add Hazelnut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ask them to hold the whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So a Venti latte with almond milk and hazelnut, no whipped cream, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is right!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you going in to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I will go through the drivethrough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you have any rewards?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: not today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. So nothing else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you ask them to add nutmeg to the top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nutmeg - got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If they are out of almond milk, what are my options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can get soy or skim

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have them use skim if they are out

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes ma'am, I will have them substitute it if necessary

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They will have it ready in the drivethrough in 10 minutes
